name: Toilet Paper Building
description:
Please download the itch.io app to easily update the game whenever a new one is released :) DISCORD SERVER The game is currently early access and anything in the game is subject to change. All feedback is appreciated and expected when you play this game, and you can give it by commenting on this page, joining the discord server or by sending me an email :)

Trello Board: https://trello.com/b/TKku0Mk1/toilet-paper-building

This is a game where you can build with toilet paper, either for creative purposes or to defend yourself from the environment.

As of now the controls are 

General

 - WASD/Controller Joystick to move

 - Left Shift/L3 to run

- Space/X/A to jump

 - Escape/Start to pause

Building

 - R/Triangle/Y to switch between Weapon mode and Build mode

 - E or Q/L1 or R2 to switch between build pieces

 - Left Click/Right Trigger to Place/Shoot

 - E or Q/L1 or R2 to charge toilet paper launcher

 - Left CTRL/Left Trigger to snap to building piece

 - Left CTRL+Left Shift/Left Trigger+L3 alternative snapping

Email: leomadsgard@gmail.com
